resources.string:
Verse is an active lyric finder application which uses advanced search algorithm(Google Search)to give the lyrics of the song played in Spotify.

If there are any features that you wish Verse had, Please send'em my way through the feedback option

#NOT ALL SONGS HAVE LYRICS
Spotify Ads can spoil your mood\nAllow Verse to block the ads.\nTap the â“˜ icon to learn how it works.
Verse keep showing \'play a song on spotify?\'
It\'s possible that you haven\'t turned on Device Broadcast status on the first usage of Verse\n\nSpotify >Settings >Device Broadcast Status
Only song name is displayed and not the lyrics?

This app does not have the ability to give lyrics for all the songs(sometimes even if its quite popular)

Also lyrics for remixes won't match because...you know its called a remix
for a reason
Verse need this setting in Spotify to actively display lyrics. Please enable the settings in spotify.
You need to turn on notification access for verse to make it detect Ads.If AdBlock isn\'t working, turn on and off the notification access for Verse.

Ver.3.2

-UI tweaks

-Open the identified song in spotify if available.

-Removed the toast message for song name and added a new UI for the same.

Ver.3.1

-Fixed some typos

-Added toast message to 'Identify Song' option to show song name when Verse is not open

Ver.3.0

-Added "what's new" in navigation menu

-Added "Rate app in Playstore" feature

-Added "System default" theme option.

-Added "Identify Song" feature

-Fixed Ad Block

-Fixed version notation to match playstore.

-Fixed uncertainty in song name when switched between "Identify song" and "Lyrics" options.

-UI fixes

-Removed old ester egg and added a new one.


Ver.3.0.1
-Fixed Shared preferences.
